law.catch_line: Each local board shall provide specimen ballots, so labeled, for all ballots to be used in each elec...
law.text:
Each local board shall provide specimen ballots, so labeled, for all ballots to be used in each election:
for mailing to registered voters under Title 8 of this article, if mailing of specimen ballots is chosen or required in the county; and
for other informational purposes in accordance with the provisions of this article.
